first_para: Daniel John Rogerson (born 23 July 1975, St Austell) is a British Liberal Democrat politician. He has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for North Cornwall since the 2005 General election and Liberal Democrat Minister at the Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs since October 2013.

full.extract: Daniel John Rogerson (born 23 July 1975, St Austell) is a British Liberal Democrat politician. He has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for North Cornwall since the 2005 General election and Liberal Democrat Minister at the Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs since October 2013.
full.title: Dan Rogerson
